Books You Should Read

Business and Management

  • An Everyone Culture: Becoming a Deliberately Developmental Organization — Robert Kegan and Lisa Laskow Lahey
  • An Introduction to General Systems Thinking — Gerald Weinberg
  • The Leadership Challenge — Barry Posner and James M. Kouzes

Life, Mind, and Spirit

  • Noble Strategy — Thanissaro Bhikkhu
  • Mind Illuminated — Culadasa
  • A History of God — Karen Armstrong
  • Meditations — Marcus Aurelius

Cooking

  • The Food Lab — J. Kenji Lopez-Alt

Literature

  • The Amazing Adventures of Kavalier and Clay — Michael Chabon
  • The Adventures and Misadventures of Maqroll — Álvaro Mutis
  • Invisible Cities — Italo Calvino
